description: Foodies of Portland are aware of the importance of sourcing local ingredients to make quality cuisine. The incredible crew at Cafe de Crepe is no exception, and this is why nothing tastes quite as great as their selection of made-from-scratch crepes.You can find this fantastic truck serving up this French favorite at most local farmers markets, and you’ll get why folks line up by the dozens because you too will be lovin’ all their delicious homemade toppings; Oregon Hazelnut, Sweet Cream, or Smoked Dill, Oregon Spicy Hazelnut, are only a few of the kinds of crepes that they can make just for you.
name: Cafe De Crepe
